value.title: Why data governance is essential for enterprise AI
value.excerpt:
Learn why we need to focus first on managing, understanding and protecting the data that is input into the AI models with data governance.

value.title: How ChatGPT turned generative AI into an “anything tool”
value.excerpt: I’ve heard similar things from technologists working on everything from health insurance to semiconductor design. value.title: Is It Time We Stop Saying AI?
value.excerpt: AI has become a buzzword across almost every industry. But the widespread and often indiscriminate use of the term is raising a question: Is it time we stop saying "AI"?

value.title: The Evolving Role Of CIOs And CTOs In The AI Economy
value.excerpt: By guiding the C-suite on AI's business risks and opportunities and leading responsible AI adoption, CIOs and CTOs can benefit from generative AI in the coming decade.

value.title: Does Artificial Intelligence Threaten Programmers?
value.excerpt: AI can automate some aspects of a programmer's work, but it won't fully replace them. Programmers will still be needed to make key decisions, solve complex problems and create value-added software. value.title: Man Accused Of Stealing Dead Brother's Identity In 1965 Caught With Facial Recognition
value.excerpt: BANGOR, Maine (AP) — An 86-year-old man accused of assuming his brother’s identity decades ago and using it to double dip on Social Security benefits has been convicted of several charges, caught by facial recognition technology that matched the same face to two different identities, authorities say.

value.title: Meta’s New AI Can Translate Speech and Text for Nearly 100 Languages
value.excerpt: SeamlessM4T builds on Meta's previous AI work. In July 2022, the company launched its No Language Left Behind project, which uses AI to do text-to-text translations for 200 languages with an emphasis on improving translations for rarer or less commonly used languages.

value.title: Two-thirds of professionals think AI will increase their skills' value
value.excerpt: Of the professionals surveyed, 64% said they expect their professional skills to be "more highly prized" over the next five years. Twenty-four percent of those respondents see that positive change occurring in the next 18 months while 40% see it happening between 18 months and five years from now.

value.title: Machine learning with decentralized training data using federated learning on Amazon SageMaker

value.title: Meta Releases SeamlessM4T AI Model to Translate Languages in Real-Time
value.excerpt: For the SeamlessM4T model, Meta researchers said in a research paper that they gathered audio training data from 4 million hours of "raw audio originating from a publicly available repository of crawled web data," without specifying which repository.
